messages.content: I'm trying to figure out how to allocate my study time for Functional Analysis, I've got 4 hours a day to dedicate, but I'm only using 2 hours now, so I need to increase my study time by 2 hours, which is like, 100% more, lol, I don't know how to make a schedule for this ->-> 1,2
